activities: Career Partners International collects personal information from users of its online career portal.  This includes name, street address, email address, phone number, and any other information provided. The information is required for registration on the portal, creating an account and for Resume Maker.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client and customer data including manually processed data
recoursemech: EU and Swiss Data Protection Authorities
